name: Character Class
description: The character's class, such as warrior, mage, rogue, etc.

name: Race
description: The fantasy race of the character, like human, elf, dwarf, etc.

name: Strength
description: The strength attribute of the character, affecting physical power.

name: Intelligence
description: The intelligence attribute of the character, affecting spellcasting and problem-solving.

name: Charisma
description: The charisma attribute of the character, affecting social interaction and influence.

name: Personality Traits
description: Key personality traits that define the character's behavior.

name: Background
description: A brief background story or origin of the character.

name: Agility
description: The agility attribute, affecting dexterity and speed.
